section.title: Download Instructions
section.para: To obtain the MBQC repository, you can follow these steps:

listitem.para: Go to the MBQC repository on GitHub: MBQC Repository

Locate the green "Code" button and select your preferred method to download the repository:
HTTPS: https://github.com/ediparquantum/MBQC.git
SSH: git@github.com:ediparquantum/MBQC.git
GitHub CLI: gh repo clone ediparquantum/MBQC

section.para: In your terminal, navigate to the folder where you want to access the project, for example: cd /home/username/projects/
Clone the repository using one of the provided methods, such as the SSH method: git clone git@github.com:ediparquantum/MBQC.git
Navigate to the MBQC directory: cd MBQC
Change to the build directory: cd build
At this point, your current directory should be: /home/username/projects/MBQC/build

Before proceeding, ensure that you have the following dependencies installed:
CMake
Graphviz
QuEST
Boost
Once you have the necessary dependencies, you can continue with the build process.
